h1.span: BENJAMIN LOGAN SCHOOLS WILL BE CLOSED FROM MARCH 13 TO MAY 1 PER THE GOVERNOR DIRECTIVE. ALL AFTER SCHOOL PRACTICES AND ACTIVITIES ARE ALSO CANCELLED THROUGH THAT PERIOD.
